Package com.jjjwelectronics.scanner

Interface IBarcodeScanner

All Superinterfaces:
IDevice<BarcodeScannerListener>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBarcodeScanner, BarcodeScanner
public interface IBarcodeScanner extends IDevice<BarcodeScannerListener>
Abstract base type for barcode scanners.
Author:
JJJW Electronics LLP

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    scan(BarcodedItem item)
    Simulates the customer's action of scanning an item.

    Methods inherited from interface com.jjjwelectronics.IDevice

    deregister, deregisterAll, disable, enable, isDisabled, isPluggedIn, isPoweredUp, listeners, plugIn, register, turnOff, turnOn, unplug

  • Method Details

    • scan

      void scan(BarcodedItem item)
      Simulates the customer's action of scanning an item. The result of the scan is only announced to any registered observers. Requires power.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to scan. Of course, it will only work if the item has a barcode, and maybe not even then.
